addDiscountCode(string,uint256).details: Add or update a discount code

addToWhitelist(address).details: Add a single address to the whitelist

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the contract with base URI and ticket configurations

params.amount: The amount of tickets in the oferta

isWhitelisted(address).details: Get the whitelist status for an address

params._address: Address to check whitelist status for

returns._0: true if the address is whitelisted, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.discountCode: Optional discount code (empty string for no discount)

removeFromWhitelist(address).details: Remove an address from the whitelist

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._active: Whether the early bird window is active
Whether the sale window is active

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the ERC]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.

addToWhitelist(address).notice: This is a convenience function for adding individual addressesFor larger whitelists, use the merkle tree approach with setWhitelistMerkleRoot

removeFromWhitelist(address).notice: This is a convenience function for removing individual addressesFor larger whitelists, use the merkle tree approach with setWhitelistMerkleRoot
